dataset_documentation.purpose: Research reproducibility for Supply Chain Analytics paper

epa_emission_factors.description: EPA Supply Chain GHG Emission Factors based on official v1.3 data
epa_emission_factors.coverage: US transportation modes and industry sectors
epa_emission_factors.data_quality: High - based on official EPA methodology

climatiq_emission_factors.description: Emission factors for various fuel types and regions
climatiq_emission_factors.source: Sample data structure based on Climatiq API

climate_trace_emissions.description: Historical emissions tracking by region and transport type
climate_trace_emissions.source: Sample structure based on Climate TRACE methodology
climate_trace_emissions.coverage: 2023-2024 monthly data for major global regions
climate_trace_emissions.data_quality: Medium - synthetic time series with realistic patterns

synthetic_networks.description: Supply chain network topologies for optimization experiments
synthetic_networks.source: Generated using realistic geographic and operational parameters
synthetic_networks.data_quality: High - controlled synthetic data for reproducible experiments

experimental_scenarios.coverage: Full factorial design across key variables

usage_guidelines.academic_use: Freely available for research and educational purposes
usage_guidelines.citation_required: Please cite the associated paper when using this data

dataset_documentation.contact: See paper authors for questions about data usage
